Twist

Take me back to the 60s! This is a classic twist rythm made famous by Chubby Checker with "The Twist".

  • Twist
  • Twist4
  • TwistSus
  • Twist4Sus
  • TwistIntro
  • TwistEnd

Twist

A basic 50s twist. (4)
Bass FretlessBass
Chord-Guitar CleanGuitar
Chord-Piano Piano2
Drum-Clap HandClap
Drum-Pedalhh PedalHiHat
Drum-Phh PedalHiHat

Twist4

Same twist, leaving out a lot of eight notes. (4)
Bass FretlessBass
Chord-Guitar CleanGuitar
Chord-Piano Piano2
Drum-Clap HandClap
Drum-Pedalhh PedalHiHat
Drum-Phh PedalHiHat
